name: Flame-Forged Insight
title: Mind in Bloom: Flame-Forged Insight
desc: "Let the memories of the past accompany you on your journey, in place of forebears who now lack the strength to..."\n"The past flows through the blood into each new generation, like an unquenchable fire passed down through rituals that never cease to burn."
in_play_description:
The character deals +2 DMG with their Elemental Burst.
When you trigger an Elemental Reaction: Gain 1 stack of Mind in Bloom. When Mind in Bloom is at 2 or more stacks, consume 2 stacks of Mind in Bloom to grant the attached character 1 Energy.
